original_text: And should not you have had mercy on your fellow servant, as I had mercy on you?’
korean_text: 내가 너를 불쌍히 여김과 같이 너도 네 동료를 불쌍히 여김이 마땅하지 아니하냐 하고

sentences.original_text: And should not you have had mercy on your fellow servant
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 동료 종에게 긍휼을 베풀었어야 하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: as I had mercy on you?’
